item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Firefly Aerospace, AutoZone, Sempra, Halliburton and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: Powell says slowing labor market prompted rate cut, sees 'challenging situation' ahead
item.description: Powell said Tuesday that weakness in the labor market is outweighing concerns about stubborn inflation.

item.title: Watch Fed Chair Jerome Powell speak live on interest rates and the economy
item.description: Powell speaks Tuesday to the Greater Providence Chamber of Commerce 2025 Economic Outlook Luncheon.

item.title: St. Louis Fed President Musalem sees 'limited room' for more interest rate cuts
item.description: Musalem on Monday reiterated his support for last week's interest rate cut but said he is wary about going much further.
